room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: It was awesome! We struggled a little bit but we finished with 5 minutes remaining. It was good fun for everyone

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: We had so much fun! There were 11 of us, half teens and half adults. Everyone could do something and the puzzles were awesome!!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: We went with our management team for a teambuilding retreat and it was so fun! Loved the playground theme we did! The staff was friendly and helped along the way!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: What a fun way to get out of the heat & solve some puzzles! From the moment we arrived at check-in to our "guide's" guidance, everything was perfect! We did the Playground & it was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: Absolutely phenomenal. The rooms are so well planned and executed that you spend just as much time admiring their handiwork as you do working out the solutions to the puzzles. Our group tackled Playground and Black Ops and had a fantastic time in both rooms. The staff is friendly and helpful and really make go out of their way to make sure you have a great time. You can clearly tell that they love their jobs and have fun running the games for people. Can't wait to go back and experience the last 2 rooms and hope they bring more great games in the future.
